title: Designing Higher-Order Thinking-Promoting Questioning Strategies for Higher Education Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Pre-Service Elementary Teachers and Job Seekers Practicing Applicable Questioning Techniques in Science Classes via Simulation-Based Learning

learning_goals: Design and implement 20 questions corresponding to the top three levels (analysis/evaluation/creation) of Bloom’s Taxonomy within a science lesson context.
Generate open-ended questions that increase cognitive engagement in a VR simulation environment with 80% accuracy.
Propose strategies to improve instructional effectiveness by 15% through peer feedback-based question strategy refinement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
